english.segment1: I need you here. I need you here. You're like the rain that falls. Fall on this heart and make me new
english.segment2: I look to you. I look to you. You're king above the earth. And you have put heaven in my heart
english.segment3: I only want to be where you are
english.segment4: Holy, holy is the Lord. King of glory. Forever saviour of the world
english.segment8: Though mountains may be moved. And fall into the raging seas. You'll never let me fall. You hold me in your nail-scared hands
english.segment9: I only want te be where you are (3x)
